api_token.description: Oh Dear API token. If not set, uses `OHDEAR_TOKEN` env var.

api_url.description: Oh Dear API URL. If not set, uses `OHDEAR_API_URL` env var. Defaults to `https://ohdear.app`.

team_id.description: The default team ID to use for sites. If not set, uses `OHDEAR_TEAM_ID` env var.
ID of the team for this site. If not set, will use `team_id` configured in provider.

url.description: URL of the site to be checked.

certificate_health.description: Enable certificate health checks. Requires the url to use https.

certificate_transparency.description: Enable certificate transparency checks. Requires the url to use https.

block.description: Set the checks enabled for the site. If block is not present, it will enable all checks.
`ohdear_site` manages a site in Oh Dear.
